attributes.action: Thomas Cook execs to pay back the Millions of pounds in bonuses after collapse
attributes.additional_details:
9000 UK workers are without a job.
Bonuses are reported to be £20 million
attributes.background: Thomas Cook executives are reported to have earned Millions of pounds in bonuses whilst mismanaging a company that has existed for 178 years. This mismanagement has left to the collapse of this famous company and thousands of employees without a job.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for individuals.
